subject: UNHRC.
body:
UNHRC.
United Nation Human Rights Commission
Office: Switzerland ;
Address: Palais Wilson 52 rue des Pâquis CH-1201
Geneva, Switzerland.
Attn:
Sir,
UN HUMAN RIGHTS COUNCIL.
The Human Rights Council is an intergovernmental body of the United Nations, through which States discuss human rights conditions in the UN Member States. The Council’s mandate is to promote “universal respect for the protection of all human rights and fundamental freedoms for all” and “address situations of violations of human rights, including gross and systematic violations, and make recommendations thereon.”
The NHRC (Amendment) Act, 2010 has conferred on the Commission additional independence and strengthened the Commission's power with respect to promotion and protection of global human rights, investigation of alleged abuses, violation of human rights and enforcement of decisions. The Amendment Act has also widened the scope of the Commission's Mandate to include vetting of legislations at all levels to ensure their compliance with human rights norms.
The UN Human Rights Council GENEVA (12 January 2023) held a special mission in Africa to discuss the implications of the human rights situation, abuses in the continent. At the special session, the Human Rights Council adopted resolution HRC/RES/S-32/1, which requested the High Commissioner to designate an expert on foreigners abuses of human rights in Nigeria and Africa, special cases on fund beneficiaries.
UNHRC Vision: To be the undisputed leading and dominant Human Right services institution globally.
UNHRC reputation and success is built upon a foundation of integrity- a commitment to act within the highest ethical standards and sincerity, honestly and transparently.
An Auditor from a Bank has raised an alarm about your violated, and blacklisted abandoned payment file against some Big Banks in Nigeria and Africa, on a proper and careful forensic Analysis conducted by United Nation Human Right Commission Auditors to ascertain reason(s) responsible for your nonpayment, what we discovered was shocking, your payment file was violated, marked as exhibit.
Something was fundamentally wrong with the way and manner your payment was approved initially.
The UN Human Rights Commission in partnership with our stakeholders has written a formal petition to the Nigerian and African authorities, and we have ordered that your breached and blacklisted file be transferred to a more reliable, credible, transparent and a customer friendly Bank 'African Development Bank, ADB.
Upon receipt of this message,  you are urgently advised to contact the Management of African Development Bank, ADB , and request for an official and proper normalization and validation process, for a hitch free wire remittance. The process will enable you to have fresh and  original documents authenticating legitimacy of your funds and your ownership. Note, there are obligations.
Always, quote your reference file number: FGN/UNHRC/CA/HFT/2023. Without any fear or contradiction, and based on convictions insist on dealing with management of African Development Bank, ADB.
We encourage you to go through normal processes, validate your file and obtain original documents for a hitch crediting of your account.
Contact:
ADB
African Development Bank Group
1521 Cadastral Zone A0
Off Memorial Close
Central Business District
Abuja
Attn: Mr. Hakim Ben Hammouda
Director Int'l Desk, African Development Bank-ADB-Nigeria
Email: 
adbwaregionalunit12@outlook.com
We are solidly behind you, be bold and fight for your rights.
Take this notice seriously, and it is highly confidential.
Thanks,
Dr. Cecil Abraham.
Senior High Commissioner for UN-Human Right

subject: Re:   UNHRC.
body:
Dear Dr. Cecil Abraham,

Thank you for your email and the information provided. I am relieved to know that the United Nations Human Rights Commission is involved in this matter and is working towards a resolution.

I understand from your email that my payment file was violated and marked as an exhibit, which is indeed shocking news. I appreciate the efforts of the UNHRC auditors in uncovering this issue.

As per your advice, I will contact the Management of African Development Bank (ADB) to request an official revalidation process for a hitch-free wire transfer. I will ensure to quote my reference file number FGN UNHRC CA HFT during all correspondence with them.

Once again, thank you for your support and guidance in this matter.

Best wishes,
Hugh
